## [0.4.2] - 2022-08-24

### Documentation

- update the quickstart & sampling notebooks
- more stable sphinx-build & update old index

### Maintenance
- fine-tune git-chglog settings to my needs
- start with a CHANGELOG
- add description to types of allowed commits
